segmentController(String) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method checks the user-entered segment using a text file that contains all usable segments.
setCnd(String) - Static method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method returns true or false depending on whether the user wants to view the event list or not
stateController(String) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method checks the user-entered state_code using a text file that contains all usable state_codes.
stateEvents(Vector<Events>, Vector<String>) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method displays the events grouped by State.
StatsToJson(Vector<Events>, String, boolean) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method shows the statistics for a state and if the boolean is true it also shows all events.
StatsToJson(Vector<Events>, String, String, boolean) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method shows the statistics for a state and a genre, and if the boolean is true it also shows all events.
StatsToJson(Vector<Events>, String, String, JSONObject) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method displays the statistics of a series of events grouped by state and genre
StatsToJson(Vector<Events>, String, JSONObject) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method displays the statistics of a series of events filtered by state and the events grouped for genre.
StatsToJson(Vector<Events>, Vector<Events>, Vector<Events>, Vector<Events>, String, String, String, String, boolean) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method shows the statistics for 2 states and 2 genres, and if the boolean is true it also shows all events.
StatsToJson_genre(Vector<Events>, Vector<Events>, String, String, String, boolean) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method shows the statistics for a state and two genres, and if the boolean is true it also shows all events.
StatsToJson_state(Vector<Events>, Vector<Events>, String, String, String, boolean) - Method in class it.univpm.exam_project.services.EventServiceImpl
This method shows the statistics for two states and a genre, and if the boolean is true it also shows all events.
